packs.name: Accessible Palette
packs.description: Colors with 4.5:1 contrast against their designated background (white or black), meeting WCAG AA standards. Neutral colors meet 4.5:1 against both.

packs.name: Ant Design Colors
packs.description: Complete color palette from Ant Design v6 — 12 color families with 10 algorithmically generated shades each. Palette identical to v5; v6 enables CSS variables by default. The most popular enterprise UI system for React.

packs.name: Apple HIG Colors
packs.description: iOS and macOS system colors from Apple Human Interface Guidelines — 12 vibrant system colors and 6 gray levels, each with light and dark variants. sRGB baseline values; iOS 26 Liquid Glass adjustments are dynamic and not yet published. 36 tokens total.

packs.name: Arco Design Colors
packs.description: ByteDance Arco Design functional color palette — 5 color families (blue, green, orange, red, gray) each with a 10-step gradient scale from lightest to darkest, generated via the @arco-design/color algorithm.

packs.name: Atlassian Design Colors
packs.description: Atlassian Design System color palette — 9 hue families (red, orange, yellow, green, teal, blue, purple, magenta, lime) with 12 steps each, plus a 12-step neutral scale. 120 tokens from @atlaskit/tokens v6.

packs.name: Base Web Colors
packs.description: Uber Base Web primitive color tokens — primary blue, negative red, warning gold, and positive green scales (50-700), plus black/white and rating star colors. The foundation palette for Base Web React components.

packs.name: Bootstrap 5 Colors
packs.description: Bootstrap 5.3 color system — theme colors (primary through dark), 9-step gray scale, and 10 extended color families with tint/shade variants. The most widely used CSS framework palette.

packs.name: Button Tokens
packs.description: Complete button component tokens — 3 sizes (sm, md, lg) with padding, radius, and font size for each. Includes primary, secondary, outline, ghost, and destructive color variants with hover and disabled states.

packs.name: IBM Carbon Colors
packs.description: Complete color palette from IBM Carbon Design System v11 — 12 color families with 10 grades each (10–100). Enterprise-grade design tokens for data-rich interfaces.

packs.name: Card Tokens
packs.description: Card component tokens — 3 elevation levels (flat, raised, floating) with padding, radius, shadow, and surface colors. Includes header, body, and footer spacing for consistent card layouts.

packs.name: Catppuccin Colors
packs.description: Catppuccin — a community-driven pastel theme with 4 flavors (Latte, Frappé, Macchiato, Mocha). 26 named colors per flavor spanning accents, text layers, surfaces, and backgrounds. 104 tokens total.

packs.name: Chakra UI Colors
packs.description: Complete color palette from Chakra UI v2 — 10 color families with 10 shades each (50–900). A balanced, accessible palette for modern React applications.

packs.name: Chakra UI v3 Colors
packs.description: Chakra UI v3 color palette — 10 color families with 11 shades each (50–950). Restructured palette with deeper darks and new 950 shade. 110 tokens.

packs.name: Cool Palette
packs.description: Cool ocean and winter-inspired colors with icy blues, deep navy, and frosted tones

packs.name: DaisyUI Themes
packs.description: Semantic color tokens from 5 popular DaisyUI v5 themes (light, dark, cupcake, nord, dracula). Ready-to-use themed palettes built on Tailwind CSS with primary, secondary, accent, neutral, base, and state colors.

packs.name: Dark Mode Semantics
packs.description: Complete semantic color system for dark themes — matching roles to Light Mode Semantics with dark-optimized values. Hover, pressed, disabled, and focus variants included.

packs.name: Dracula Colors
packs.description: Dracula — a popular dark color scheme with vibrant accent colors. Includes background, foreground, and 8 syntax/UI accent colors designed for comfortable, high-contrast readability.

packs.name: Duration Scale
packs.description: T-shirt sized duration tokens — from instant (50ms) to deliberate (1000ms). Includes contextual presets for tooltips, modals, drawers, page transitions, and loading states.

packs.name: Earth Palette
packs.description: Warm, organic earth tones drawn from clay, soil, stone, and foliage

packs.name: Element Plus Colors
packs.description: Element Plus default color system — 5 semantic color families (primary, success, warning, danger, info) each with light-3 through light-9 and dark-2 variants. The standard palette for Vue 3 enterprise applications.

packs.name: Elevation System
packs.description: Generic 6-level elevation system with light and dark mode shadows. From flat surfaces (level 0) to floating dialogs (level 5). Consistent depth hierarchy for any UI.

packs.name: Evergreen Colors
packs.description: Segment Evergreen UI color system — 8 color families (blue, red, green, orange, yellow, teal, purple, neutral) with graduated scales from lightest to darkest. Designed for intentional, accessible, high-dynamic-range interfaces.

packs.name: Microsoft Fluent UI Colors
packs.description: Microsoft Fluent UI 2 shared color palette — 18 color families (cranberry, red, orange, peach, marigold, yellow, green, teal, cyan, blue, royalBlue, cornflower, navy, lavender, purple, berry, pink, magenta) with 12 stops each, plus 16-step Brand Web ramp. 232 tokens from @fluentui/tokens.

packs.name: Fluid Easing Curves
packs.description: Comprehensive easing curve collection — standard timing functions plus specialized curves for bounce, elastic, and spring-like motion. 16 production-ready cubic-bezier curves.

packs.name: Fluid Type Scale
packs.description: Responsive typography scale using CSS clamp() values. 8 steps from step-2 to step5, scaling fluidly between 320px and 1240px viewports. Includes matching line heights and font weights.

packs.name: Zendesk Garden Colors
packs.description: Zendesk Garden color palette — 7 hue families (grey, blue, red, yellow, green, kale, royal) each with 8 shades (100-800). Designed with consistent contrast ratios: 600 meets 3:1, 700 meets 4.5:1, 800 meets 7:1 against white.

packs.name: Geist Colors
packs.description: Vercel Geist Design System colors — a 9-step gray background scale, 8 accent hues (blue, cyan, green, orange, red, purple, pink, yellow), and 3 semantic colors for success, error, and warning states.

packs.name: 8-Point Grid Spacing
packs.description: Spacing system based on the 8-point grid. Includes 20 base grid steps (8px-160px), half-grid fine adjustments, component spacing presets, and layout section spacing.

packs.name: Gruvbox Colors
packs.description: Gruvbox — a retro groove color scheme with warm, desaturated tones. Includes dark and light background scales, foreground values, 7 standard accents, 7 bright accents, and a neutral gray. 31 tokens total.

packs.name: IBM Carbon Type Scale
packs.description: Typography tokens from IBM Carbon Design System v11. Includes productive type set with font sizes, weights, line heights, and letter spacing for caption through heading-07.

packs.name: Input Tokens
packs.description: Form input tokens — 3 sizes (sm, md, lg) with state coverage: default, hover, focus, error, and disabled. Includes dimensions and colors for text inputs, selects, and textareas.

packs.name: iOS Elevation
packs.description: Shadow tokens inspired by Apple HIG elevation — navigation bars, cards, sheets, modals, and alerts. Tuned for the subtle, diffused shadow style used across iOS and macOS.

packs.name: Light Mode Semantics
packs.description: Complete semantic color system for light themes — primary, secondary, surface, and state roles with hover, pressed, disabled, and focus variants. Primary and state colors target WCAG AA contrast.

packs.name: Salesforce Lightning Colors
packs.description: Salesforce Lightning Design System (SLDS) color palette — 12 hue families (blue, cloud blue, green, teal, hot orange, orange, yellow, pink, red, purple, violet, indigo) with 12-step scales, plus a 14-step neutral. 158 tokens. Primitive values identical in SLDS 2.

packs.name: Mantine Colors
packs.description: Complete color palette from Mantine v7 — 14 color families with 10 shades each (0–9). A vibrant, accessible palette built on Open Color foundations for React applications.

packs.name: Marketing Starter Kit
packs.description: Bold token set for marketing sites and landing pages — vibrant brand colors, dramatic type scale, generous spacing, and eye-catching shadows. Makes every landing page pop.

packs.name: Material Design 3 Colors
packs.description: Semantic color tokens from Google Material Design 3 (Material You). Includes baseline light and dark theme palettes with primary, secondary, tertiary, error, and surface roles.

packs.name: Material Motion
packs.description: Material Design 3 motion tokens — standard and emphasized easing curves plus duration tokens for short, medium, long, and extra-long transitions. Based on the M3 motion spec.

packs.name: Material Design 3 Type Scale
packs.description: Complete Material Design 3 type system with display, headline, title, body, and label roles at large, medium, and small sizes. Includes font size, weight, line height, and letter spacing for each.

packs.name: Mobile App Starter Kit
packs.description: Compact token set for mobile app design — touch-friendly spacing, platform-appropriate radii, compact type scale, and elevation hierarchy. Optimized for iOS and Android.

packs.name: Typographic Modular Scales
packs.description: Three classic modular type scales: minor third (1.2), major third (1.25), and perfect fourth (1.333). Each provides 10 steps from -2 to 7 with a 1rem base.

packs.name: Monochrome Palette
packs.description: Refined grayscale and monochrome tokens for minimalist interfaces, plus tinted neutral variations

packs.name: Monokai Colors
packs.description: Monokai — the classic dark color scheme by Wimer Hazenberg. Features vibrant syntax accent colors against a warm, dark olive-tinted background. Includes 6 syntax colors and editor UI values.

packs.name: Neon Palette
packs.description: High-energy neon and electric colors for bold UIs, gaming, and creative projects

packs.name: Neutral Surfaces
packs.description: 10-level surface hierarchy for light and dark modes — from background to highest elevation. Includes on-surface text colors for each level. Pairs with any brand palette.

packs.name: Nord Colors
packs.description: The Nord color palette — 16 carefully chosen arctic colors across 4 palettes: Polar Night (dark backgrounds), Snow Storm (light text/surfaces), Frost (primary accents), and Aurora (status/accent colors).

packs.name: One Dark Colors
packs.description: Atom One Dark — the iconic dark theme from the Atom editor. Includes background, foreground, 6 syntax accent colors, and editor UI colors for gutter, selection, cursor, and guides.

packs.name: Opacity Scale
packs.description: Semantic opacity tokens — 10-step numeric scale plus presets for disabled states, hover overlays, scrims, watermarks, and loading states. Consistent transparency system.

packs.name: Open Props Colors
packs.description: System-agnostic color palette from Open Props. 17 color families with 13 shades each (0–12), designed for universal use across any design system.

packs.name: Pastel Palette
packs.description: Soft, muted pastels ideal for gentle UIs, cards, tags, and backgrounds

packs.name: Shopify Polaris Colors
packs.description: Shopify Polaris color palette — 13 scales (gray, rose, red, orange, yellow, lime, green, cyan, teal, azure, blue, purple, magenta) with 16 steps each. 208 tokens from @shopify/polaris-tokens v9.4.

packs.name: GitHub Primer Colors
packs.description: Base color scales from GitHub Primer design system — 8 chromatic families with 10 shades (0–9) plus a 14-step neutral ramp. Built on Style Dictionary, one of the closest to DTCG-native.

packs.name: Radix UI Colors
packs.description: Accessible 12-step color scales from Radix UI. Each step has a specific use case — from subtle backgrounds (1–2) through component backgrounds (3–5), borders (6–8), solid colors (9–10), to text (11–12).

packs.name: Responsive Breakpoints
packs.description: Standard responsive breakpoints — mobile-first min-widths (xs through 2xl), desktop-first max-widths, and container query widths. Foundation for adaptive layouts.

packs.name: Rosé Pine Colors
packs.description: Rosé Pine — an all-natural pine, faux fur, and a bit of soho vibes. 3 variants: Main (darkest), Moon (mid-dark), and Dawn (light). Each variant includes base surfaces, muted/subtle text, foreground, 6 accent colors, and highlight layers.

packs.name: Rounded System
packs.description: Comprehensive border radius scale — 10-step base scale from sharp (0) to full pill (9999px) plus semantic presets for buttons, cards, inputs, badges, avatars, and modals.

packs.name: SaaS Starter Kit
packs.description: Complete token foundation for SaaS dashboards — brand colors, neutral scale, semantic states, type scale, spacing, shadows, and border radii. Bootstrap a full design system in one click.

packs.name: Semi Design Colors
packs.description: ByteDance Semi Design color palette — 10 hue families (blue, cyan, green, yellow, orange, red, pink, purple, violet, grey) each with a 10-step scale from lightest (0) to darkest (9), totaling 100 color tokens.

packs.name: Shadcn/ui Colors
packs.description: Default shadcn/ui v4 theme tokens (zinc base) — semantic color pairs for backgrounds, cards, popovers, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, charts, and sidebar. Light and dark modes. 62 tokens.

packs.name: Soft UI Shadows
packs.description: Neumorphism-inspired shadow system — convex (raised), concave (pressed), and flat states with paired light/dark shadows. Perfect for soft, tactile UI designs.

packs.name: Solarized Colors
packs.description: Solarized — a precision-engineered 16-color palette by Ethan Schoonover. 8 monotone base colors (supporting both light and dark modes) plus 8 accent colors with balanced contrast and CIELAB lightness relationships.

packs.name: Adobe Spectrum Colors
packs.description: Adobe Spectrum 2 color palette — 15 scales (gray, blue, red, orange, yellow, green, cyan, seafoam, indigo, purple, fuchsia, magenta, pink, chartreuse, celery) for light theme. 237 tokens from @adobe/spectrum-tokens.

packs.name: Starter Palette
packs.description: A production-ready starter palette for new projects — semantic theme colors, 10-step neutral scale, and state colors. WCAG AA compliant. Fork-friendly CC0 license.

packs.name: Status Colors System
packs.description: Comprehensive status color system — success, warning, error, and info with 9 role-based variants each: base, background, foreground, border, icon, hover, pressed, subtle, and strong.

packs.name: Tailwind CSS Colors
packs.description: Complete Tailwind CSS v4.2 color palette — 26 color families with 11 shades each (50–950). Includes 4 new tinted neutrals (mauve, olive, mist, taupe) added in v4.2. The industry-standard utility color system.

packs.name: Tailwind CSS Core
packs.description: Spacing scale, font sizes, font weights, border radii, and shadows from Tailwind CSS v4. Pairs with the Tailwind Colors pack.

packs.name: Tokyo Night Colors
packs.description: Tokyo Night — a dark theme inspired by Tokyo city lights at night. Includes night and storm variant backgrounds, foreground layers, and 8 vibrant syntax accent colors.

packs.name: Vuetify Material Design Colors
packs.description: Material Design color palette from Vuetify 3 — 16 color families (red through deep orange) with base values and full lighten/darken variant scales for key families. The standard palette for Vue Material Design applications.

packs.name: Warm Palette
packs.description: Warm sunset and autumn-inspired colors with amber, burnt orange, and rose gold tones

packs.name: Z-Index System
packs.description: Named z-index layers for consistent stacking — base, dropdown, sticky, overlay, modal, popover, toast, and tooltip. Prevents z-index conflicts with clear semantic layers.

packs.name: DTCG Complete Reference
packs.description: Reference pack demonstrating every token type in the W3C Design Tokens specification. Use as a template for creating new packs.
